body:
The intel package @18.0.4 installs binaries that report version 18.0.5. I noticed this when `spack compiler find` pulled them in as 18.0.5.

### Spack version
<!-- Add the output to the command below -->
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.1-454-146bc60
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install intel@18.0.4
$ $(spack location -i intel@18.0.4)/bin/icc --version
icc (ICC) 18.0.5 20180823
Copyright (C) 1985-2018 Intel Corporation.  All rights reserved.
```

### Information on your system

RHEL7.6

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: intel@18.0.4 installs binaries that report 18.0.5
